text: Dir en grey is a rock band from Japan. They began in 1997. They have recorded twenty eight singles, three EPs and eight albums, of which they have released three in Europe and two in the United States. Vocalist Kyo uses growl, falset, mixvoice and hoistle voice in their music. Their music mixes rock and metal with tribal music. Many visual kei bands are influenced by Dir en grey. ==Members== * Kyo (京) – vocals * Kaoru (薫) – guitar * Die – guitar * Toshiya – bass * Shinya – drums ==Discography== ; Studio albums * Gauze (1999) * Macabre (2000) * Kisou (2002) * Vulgar (2003) * Withering to Death. (2005) * The Marrow of a Bone (2007) * Uroboros (2008) * Dum Spiro Spero (2011) * Arche (2014) * The Insulated World (2018) * Phalaris (2022) Category:Japanese rock bands Category:Hard rock bands Category:Japanese heavy metal bands Category:Metalcore bands Category:Visual kei bands Category:Musical groups from Osaka
title: Dir en grey
